1: וַיֵּ֥רֶד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>went down</n> שִׁמְשׁ֖וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>And Samson</n> תִּמְנָ֑תָה <sup>8553 </sup> <n>to Timnath</n> וַיַּ֥רְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and saw</n> אִשָּׁ֛ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>a woman</n> בְּתִמְנָ֖תָה <sup>8553 </sup> <n>in Timnath</n> מִבְּנ֥וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>of the daughters</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n>
2: וַיַּ֗עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>And he came up</n> וַיַּגֵּד֙ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and told</n> לְאָבִ֣יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>his father</n> וּלְאִמּ֔וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>and his mother</n> וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אִשָּׁ֛ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>a woman</n> רָאִ֥יתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>I have seen</n> בְתִמְנָ֖תָה <sup>8553 </sup> <n>in Timnath</n> מִבְּנ֣וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>of the daughters</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> וְעַתָּ֕ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> קְחוּ־ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>now therefore get</n> אוֹתָ֥הּ <sup>853 </sup> לִּ֖י לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <sup>802 </sup> <n>her for me to wife</n>
3: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> ל֜וֹ אָבִ֣יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>Then his father</n> וְאִמּ֗וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>and his mother</n> הַאֵין֩ <sup>369 </sup> <n>unto him [Is there] never</n> בִּבְנ֨וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>among the daughters</n> אַחֶ֤יךָ <sup>251 </sup> <n>of thy brethren</n> וּבְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עַמִּי֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>or among all my people</n> אִשָּׁ֔ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>a woman</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אַתָּ֤ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> הוֹלֵךְ֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>that thou goest</n> לָקַ֣חַת <sup>3947 </sup> <n>to take</n> אִשָּׁ֔ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>a wife</n> מִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>Philistine</n> הָעֲרֵלִ֑ים <sup>6189 </sup> <n>of the uncircumcised</n> וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> שִׁמְשׁ֤וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>Samson</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to his</n> אָבִיו֙ <sup>1 </sup> <n>unto his father</n> אוֹתָ֣הּ <sup>853 </sup> קַֽח־ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>Get</n> לִ֔י כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הִ֖יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יָשְׁרָ֥ה <sup>3474 </sup> <n>good</n> בְעֵינָֽי׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>affliction</n>
4: וְאָבִ֨יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>But his father</n> וְאִמּ֜וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>and his mother</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יָדְע֗וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>knew</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that it was</n> מֵיְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>not that it [was] of the LORD</n> הִ֔יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> תֹאֲנָ֥ה <sup>8385 </sup> <n>an occasion</n> הֽוּא־ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>He</n> מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>that he sought</n> מִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>against the Philistines</n> וּבָעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>for at that time</n> הַהִ֔יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>the Philistines</n> מֹשְׁלִ֥ים <sup>4910 </sup> <n>had dominion</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>over Israel</n> פ
5: וַיֵּ֧רֶד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>down</n> שִׁמְשׁ֛וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>Samson</n> וְאָבִ֥יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>and his father</n> וְאִמּ֖וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>and his mother</n> תִּמְנָ֑תָה <sup>8553 </sup> <n>to Timnath</n> וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and came</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>far</n> כַּרְמֵ֣י <sup>3754 </sup> <n>to the vineyards</n> תִמְנָ֔תָה <sup>8553 </sup> <n>of Timnath</n> וְהִנֵּה֙ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> כְּפִ֣יר <sup>3715 </sup> <n>and behold a young</n> אֲרָי֔וֹת <sup>738 </sup> <n>lion</n> שֹׁאֵ֖ג <sup>7580 </sup> <n>roared</n> לִקְרָאתֽוֹ׃ <sup>7125 </sup> <n>against</n>
6: וַתִּצְלַ֨ח <sup>6743 </sup> <n>came mightily</n> עָלָ֜יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> ר֣וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>And the Spirit</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וַֽיְשַׁסְּעֵ֙הוּ֙ <sup>8156 </sup> <n>upon him and he rent</n> כְּשַׁסַּ֣ע <sup>8156 </sup> <n>him as he would have rent</n> הַגְּדִ֔י <sup>1423 </sup> <n>a kid</n> וּמְא֖וּמָה <sup>3972 </sup> <n>and [he had] nothing</n> אֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>had</n> בְּיָד֑וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in his hand</n> וְלֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> הִגִּיד֙ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>but he told</n> לְאָבִ֣יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>not his father</n> וּלְאִמּ֔וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>or his mother</n> אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> עָשָֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>what he had done</n>
7: וַיֵּ֖רֶד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>And he went down</n> וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and talked</n> לָאִשָּׁ֑ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>with the woman</n> וַתִּישַׁ֖ר <sup>3474 </sup> <n>good</n> בְּעֵינֵ֥י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>affliction</n> שִׁמְשֽׁוֹן׃ <sup>8123 </sup> <n>Samson</n>
8: וַיָּ֤שָׁב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>he returned</n> מִיָּמִים֙ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And after a time</n> לְקַחְתָּ֔הּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>to take</n> וַיָּ֣סַר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>her and he turned aside</n> לִרְא֔וֹת <sup>7200 </sup> <n>to see</n> אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> מַפֶּ֣לֶת <sup>4658 </sup> <n>the carcase</n> הָאַרְיֵ֑ה <sup>738 </sup> <n>of the lion</n> וְהִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> עֲדַ֧ת <sup>5712 </sup> <n>and behold [there was] a swarm</n> דְּבוֹרִ֛ים <sup>1682 </sup> <n>of bees</n> בִּגְוִיַּ֥ת <sup>1472 </sup> <n>in the carcase</n> הָאַרְיֵ֖ה <sup>738 </sup> <n>of the lion</n> וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <sup>1706 </sup> <n>and honey</n>
9: וַיִּרְדֵּ֣הוּ <sup>7287 </sup> <n>And he took</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> כַּפָּ֗יו <sup>3709 </sup> <n>thereof in his hands</n> וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and came</n> הָלוֹךְ֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> וְאָכֹ֔ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>eating</n> וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>came</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to his</n> אָבִ֣יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>to his father</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and</n> אִמּ֔וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>and mother</n> וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and he gave</n> לָהֶ֖ם וַיֹּאכֵ֑לוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>them and they did eat</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> הִגִּ֣יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>but he told</n> לָהֶ֔ם כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>out</n> מִגְּוִיַּ֥ת <sup>1472 </sup> <n>out of the carcase</n> הָאַרְיֵ֖ה <sup>738 </sup> <n>of the lion</n> רָדָ֥ה <sup>7287 </sup> <n>not them that he had taken</n> הַדְּבָֽשׁ׃ <sup>1706 </sup> <n>the honey</n>
10: וַיֵּ֥רֶד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>went down</n> אָבִ֖יהוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>So his father</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָאִשָּׁ֑ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>unto the woman</n> וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>made</n> שָׁ֤ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <sup>8123 </sup> <n>and Samson</n> מִשְׁתֶּ֔ה <sup>4960 </sup> <n>there a feast</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כֵּ֥ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>this</n> יַעֲשׂ֖וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>to do</n> הַבַּחוּרִֽים׃ <sup>970 </sup> <n>for so used the young men</n>
11: וַיְהִ֖י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִּרְאוֹתָ֣ם <sup>7200 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when they saw</n> אוֹת֑וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>him that they brought</n> שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <sup>7970 </sup> <n>thirty</n> מֵֽרֵעִ֔ים <sup>4828 </sup> <n>companions</n> וַיִּהְי֖וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אִתּֽוֹ׃ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n>
12: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> לָהֶם֙ שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>And Samson</n> אָחֽוּדָה־ <sup>2330 </sup> <n>unto them I will now put forth</n> נָּ֥א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> לָכֶ֖ם חִידָ֑ה <sup>2420 </sup> <n>a riddle</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> הַגֵּ֣ד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>unto you if ye can certainly</n> תַּגִּידוּ֩ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>declare</n> אוֹתָ֨הּ <sup>853 </sup> לִ֜י שִׁבְעַ֨ת <sup>7651 </sup> <n>it me within the seven</n> יְמֵ֤י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> הַמִּשְׁתֶּה֙ <sup>4960 </sup> <n>of the feast</n> וּמְצָאתֶ֔ם <sup>4672 </sup> <n>and find [it] out</n> וְנָתַתִּ֤י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>then I will give</n> לָכֶם֙ שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <sup>7970 </sup> <n>you thirty</n> סְדִינִ֔ים <sup>5466 </sup> <n>sheets</n> וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <sup>7970 </sup> <n>and thirty</n> חֲלִפֹ֥ת <sup>2487 </sup> <n>change</n> בְּגָדִֽים׃ <sup>899 </sup> <n>of garments</n>
13: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תוּכְלוּ֮ <sup>3201 </sup> <n>But if ye cannot</n> לְהַגִּ֣יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>declare</n> לִי֒ וּנְתַתֶּ֨ם <sup>5414 </sup> <n>[it] me then shall ye give</n> אַתֶּ֥ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לִי֙ שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <sup>7970 </sup> <n>me thirty</n> סְדִינִ֔ים <sup>5466 </sup> <n>sheets</n> וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <sup>7970 </sup> <n>and thirty</n> חֲלִיפ֣וֹת <sup>2487 </sup> <n>change</n> בְּגָדִ֑ים <sup>899 </sup> <n>of garments</n> וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they said</n> ל֔וֹ ח֥וּדָה <sup>2330 </sup> <n>unto him Put forth</n> חִידָתְךָ֖ <sup>2420 </sup> <n>thy riddle</n> וְנִשְׁמָעֶֽנָּה׃ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>that we may hear</n>
14: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> לָהֶ֗ם מֵהָֽאֹכֵל֙ <sup>398 </sup> <n>unto them Out of the eater</n> יָצָ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>came forth</n> מַאֲכָ֔ל <sup>3978 </sup> <n>meat</n> וּמֵעַ֖ז <sup>5794 </sup> <n>and out of the strong</n> יָצָ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>came forth</n> מָת֑וֹק <sup>4966 </sup> <n>sweetness</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָכְל֛וּ <sup>3201 </sup> <n>And they could</n> לְהַגִּ֥יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>expound</n> הַחִידָ֖ה <sup>2420 </sup> <n>the riddle</n> שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <sup>7969 </sup> <n>not in three</n> יָמִֽים׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n>
15: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <sup>7637 </sup> <n>And it came to pass on the seventh</n> וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>that they said</n> לְאֵֽשֶׁת־ <sup>802 </sup> <n>wife</n> שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <sup>8123 </sup> <n>unto Samson's</n> פַּתִּ֣י <sup>6601 </sup> <n>Entice</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אִישֵׁ֗ךְ <sup>376 </sup> <n>thy husband</n> וְיַגֶּד־ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>that he may declare</n> לָ֙נוּ֙ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַ֣חִידָ֔ה <sup>2420 </sup> <n>unto us the riddle</n> פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>or</n> נִשְׂרֹ֥ף <sup>8313 </sup> <n>lest we burn</n> אוֹתָ֛ךְ <sup>853 </sup> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> אָבִ֖יךְ <sup>1 </sup> <n>thee and thy father's</n> בָּאֵ֑שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>with fire</n> הַלְיָרְשֵׁ֕נוּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>us to take that we have</n> קְרָאתֶ֥ם <sup>7121 </sup> <n>have ye called</n> לָ֖נוּ הֲלֹֽא׃ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n>
16: וַתֵּבְךְּ֩ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>wept</n> אֵ֨שֶׁת <sup>802 </sup> <n>wife</n> שִׁמְשׁ֜וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>And Samson's</n> עָלָ֗יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>before</n> וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>before him and said</n> רַק־ <sup>7535 </sup> <n>but</n> שְׂנֵאתַ֙נִי֙ <sup>8130 </sup> <n>Thou dost but hate</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֲהַבְתָּ֔נִי <sup>157 </sup> <n>me and lovest</n> הַֽחִידָ֥ה <sup>2420 </sup> <n>a riddle</n> חַ֙דְתָּ֙ <sup>2330 </sup> <n>me not thou hast put forth</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto the children</n> עַמִּ֔י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of my people</n> וְלִ֖י לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הִגַּ֑דְתָּה <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and hast not told</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>[it] me And he said</n> לָ֗הּ הִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>to her Behold</n> לְאָבִ֧י <sup>1 </sup> <n>[it] my father</n> וּלְאִמִּ֛י <sup>517 </sup> <n>nor my mother</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> הִגַּ֖דְתִּי <sup>5046 </sup> <n>unto her Behold I have not told</n> וְלָ֥ךְ אַגִּֽיד׃ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and shall I tell</n>
17: וַתֵּ֤בְךְּ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>And she wept</n> עָלָיו֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>before</n> שִׁבְעַ֣ת <sup>7651 </sup> <n>before him the seven</n> הַיָּמִ֔ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>while</n> הָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>lasted</n> לָהֶ֖ם הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֑ה <sup>4960 </sup> <n>while their feast</n> וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>lasted</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <sup>7637 </sup> <n>and it came to pass on the seventh</n> וַיַּגֶּד־ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>that he told</n> לָהּ֙ כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>her because</n> הֱצִיקַ֔תְהוּ <sup>6693 </sup> <n>her because she lay sore</n> וַתַּגֵּ֥ד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>upon him and she told</n> הַחִידָ֖ה <sup>2420 </sup> <n>the riddle</n> לִבְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>to the children</n> עַמָּֽהּ׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of her people</n>
18: וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> לוֹ֩ אַנְשֵׁ֨י <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> הָעִ֜יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <sup>7637 </sup> <n>unto him on the seventh</n> בְּטֶ֙רֶם֙ <sup>2962 </sup> <n>before</n> יָבֹ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>went down</n> הַחַ֔רְסָה <sup>2775 </sup> <n>before the sun</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> מָּת֣וֹק <sup>4966 </sup> <n>What [is] sweeter</n> מִדְּבַ֔שׁ <sup>1706 </sup> <n>honey</n> וּמֶ֥ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> עַ֖ז <sup>5794 </sup> <n>is stronger</n> מֵאֲרִ֑י <sup>738 </sup> <n>lion</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> לָהֶ֔ם לוּלֵא֙ <sup>3884 </sup> <n>unto them If</n> חֲרַשְׁתֶּ֣ם <sup>2790 </sup> <n>ye had not plowed</n> בְּעֶגְלָתִ֔י <sup>5697 </sup> <n>with my heifer</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> מְצָאתֶ֖ם <sup>4672 </sup> <n>ye had not found out</n> חִידָתִֽי׃ <sup>2420 </sup> <n>my riddle</n>
19: וַתִּצְלַ֨ח <sup>6743 </sup> <n>came</n> עָלָ֜יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Then</n> ר֣וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>And the Spirit</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וַיֵּ֨רֶד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>upon him and he went down</n> אַשְׁקְל֜וֹן <sup>831 </sup> <n>to Ashkelon</n> וַיַּ֥ךְ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and slew</n> מֵהֶ֣ם ׀ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <sup>7970 </sup> <n>thirty</n> אִ֗ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> וַיִּקַּח֙ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>of them and took</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חֲלִ֣יצוֹתָ֔ם <sup>2488 </sup> <n>their spoil</n> וַיִּתֵּן֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and gave</n> הַחֲלִיפ֔וֹת <sup>2487 </sup> <n>change</n> לְמַגִּידֵ֖י <sup>5046 </sup> <n>of garments unto them which expounded</n> הַחִידָ֑ה <sup>2420 </sup> <n>the riddle</n> וַיִּ֣חַר <sup>2734 </sup> <n>was kindled</n> אַפּ֔וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>And his anger</n> וַיַּ֖עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and he went up</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> אָבִֽיהוּ׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>to his father's</n> פ
20: וַתְּהִ֖י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אֵ֣שֶׁת <sup>802 </sup> <n>wife</n> שִׁמְשׁ֑וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>But Samson's</n> לְמֵ֣רֵעֵ֔הוּ <sup>4828 </sup> <n>was [given] to his companion</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> רֵעָ֖ה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>whom he had used as his friend</n> לֽוֹ׃
